title: Latin-American chicken parcels
ingredients: ['2 skinned and boned chicken breasts, about 125 g (4½ oz) each', 'Salt and black pepper', '150 g (5½ oz) frozen peas', '1 small green chilli, deseeded and chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '3 tablespoons low-fat Greek yoghurt', '2-3 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', 'Juice of 1 lime', '150 g (5½ oz) canned kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '100 g (3½ oz) tomatoes, deseeded and chopped', '2 spring onions, chopped', '4 soft wheat flour tortillas']
